1.title: Welcome to Edten
1.plot: Jason moves to Edten, Oregon with his single mother Lauren Martin and soon discovers a creature living in his home. He also befriends two bullied kids named Morgan and TJ.

2.title: Hello Darkeness My New Friend
2.plot: Jason is trying to find out what The Watcher really is. While Morgan and TJ look for answers on The Watcher.

3.title: Silence of the Limbs
3.plot: Jason gathers his friends to help him fight The Watcher, but it ends with Morgan breaking her wrist.

4.title: The Crawl Space in the House
4.plot: Jason takes a break from fighting The Watcher and decides to just try to enjoy the summer with his friends, until he discover realizes something about the evil creature.

5.title: The Shadow Man
5.plot: Jason ventures into the crawl spaces of his home with the help of his Morgan and TJ, until The Watcher takes Jason.

6.title: The Weirdos
6.plot: It's the final battle between between The Weirdos and The Watcher. Morgan and TJ have to venture in the crawl spaces in order to find and rescue Jason.

imdb.plot outline: When an 11 year-old boy named Jason Martin moves to the strange odd town of Edten, Oregon in 1991. Jason begins to notice the in denial and deadbeat people of Edten, to make matters worse a terrifying monster that him and his friends call 'The Watcher" begins to terrorize him and his friends. So together him and his friends, nicknamed "The Weirdos" have to kill "The Watcher".
imdb.title: The Visions
plot: When an 11 year-old boy named Jason Martin moves to the small odd town of Edten, Oregon in 1991, he soon discovers a terrifying creature that terrorizes him and his friends.::Sophia Messina

When an 11 year-old boy named Jason Martin moves to the strange odd town of Edten, Oregon in 1991. Jason begins to notice the in denial and deadbeat people of Edten, to make matters worse a terrifying monster that him and his friends call 'The Watcher" begins to terrorize him and his friends. So together him and his friends, nicknamed "The Weirdos" have to kill "The Watcher".::Sophia Messina

When an 11 year-old boy named Jason Martin moves to the small odd town of Edten, Oregon in 1991, he discovers not only the in denial and deadbeat people of Edten, Oregon, but also a terrifying creature that lives in his home. He soon befriends two bullied kids named Morgan Anderson and TJ Perry. So they band together and try to kill the monster they call The Watcher.::Sophia Messina
